ENTER LUCILUNA
Luciluna is on a mission to revolutionize the healthcare industry by empowering people to take control of their health through technology. Our doctor-enabling platform connects patients with medical professionals through social media, enabling easy access to viral edutainment knowledges, personalized services and solutions.
SKINCARE
NUTRITION
SEXUAL & REPRODUCTIVE HEALTH
MOM & BABY
Cancer Care
Traditional Medicine

ABOUT US

Luciluna is a newly established but fast-growing healthtech startup headquartered in Vietnam. Through our platform, women can connect with their trusted dermatologists, OBGYNs, nutritionists, and other specialists from anywhere, anytime. Our name, Luciluna, is inspired by the first woman found on Earth, and we are dedicated to empowering women to feel healthy and beautiful at their best.
